subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Sammy Sosa hit his 595th career home run, and Mark Teixeira and Brad Wilkerson each had two-run homers as the Texas Rangers defeated the host Toronto Blue Jays, 5-3.
snippet: Sammy Sosa hit his 595th career home run, and Mark Teixeira and Brad Wilkerson each had two-run homers as the Texas Rangers defeated the host Toronto Blue Jays, 5-3.
